Description: School unique reference number
Local Authority number
Establishment number
DfE number
School name
Other institution name (if the school has opened or converted since 12th Sept 2015)
School address (1)
School address (2)
School address (3)
School town
School postcode
School telephone number
School open / closed status (1 = Open, 2 = Closed, 3 = Pending closure)
Open date of school (if opened on or after 12th September 2015)
Date the school closed (if closed on or after 12th September 2015)
Is the school new? (opened on or after the 12th September 2015) ( 0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Type of school / college eg maintained school
School Type eg Voluntary Aided school
Other Institution type (if the school has opened or converted since 11th Sept 2015)
Does the school provide primary education? ( 0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Does the school provide secondary education? ( 0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Does the school provide post 16 education? (  0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Lowest age of entry
Highest age of entry
Indicates whether it's a mixed or single sex school
Indicates whether the sixth form is mixed or single sex (0 = Not Applicable 1 = Boys, 2 = Girls, 3 = Mixed)
Religious Denomination
Admission Policy
Other School unique reference number (if the school has opened or converted since 11th Sept 2015)

School academy status (1 = newly converted academy, 2 = school prior to conversion, 3 = sponsored academy, 4 = school closed to become an academy, 5 = closed school (not related to academies), 6 = no change to school status, 7 = new school)
Code of academy sponsor (If applicable)
Name of sponsor (If applicable)
Flag for academies that have changed sponsors (re-brokered) since September 2015
Flag for academies that are co-sponsored
